one_reviews_text: This is by far THE WORST game i've ever bought on this app, I can't even play basically, its not even VR.
If i could give it less than one star i would its trash just trash

review_title: I tell you what i see
one_reviews_text: Feeling of vr is good, cars are beautyfull, but only turns with keyboard are too fast.

review_title: Steering wheel works but shift wrong
one_reviews_text: There problem when using my Logitech G Force Steering wheel, the steering works, I can switch only from gear 1 to R and when I press the accelerator I can only accelerate in reverse. Not in 1 , brakes don't work

The game looks great, car looks great, racing aspect is great, BUT THE CONTROLS ARE HORRID, if ur using keyboard and mouse turning is way to sensitive and if ur using the oculus touch controllers u cant turn without braking

review_title: i think the worst game i got
one_reviews_text: i have got on some bad games but this? is the worst of them. i just wish i cold get a refund. ok the car looks ok i guss but the controls are HORABLE i coldent get five feet untill it crasht i still dont know how i got forwerds. after 10 minuts i uninstaled.
not worth a penny. terrible controls, terrible physics. oculus need to set some controls on quality before hosting

review_title: I cant believe i PAID for this
one_reviews_text: It amazes me that an app with that bad of controls and support with the oculus touch controllers can even be on the market. On key board the turning is way to sensitive and on touch controllers the car will just start braking when you turn. If im missing some game mechanic atleast put a tutorial in

It appears that there are three courses to drive on. The racing part isn't terrible and the inside of the car looks good enough, but it seems that you can't make selections with any buttons on the controller. You have to use gaze input and it's really, really slow. I tried one course and then deleted the game. It needs more work before it's ready.
review_feedback: We added an option for faster option selecting using the controller buttons in the 1.1 update which is now live. As well as other game improvements.
